i work many hours.
i use a cane to help me get around.

participant_2.background:
I tend to be a little obsessive with my cleaning habits.
my father use to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s.
i am getting married next week.
I enjoy hiking with my horses and eating ginger snaps along the way.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

content.text: Doing well! Getting married next week, I am a bit nervous but excited!
Congratulations! That is so exciting! What are you most looking forward to about it?
Just spending time with my best friends and family, and celebrating our love!
That sounds really lovely. I love hearing about other people's excitement.
Thank you! What are you up to today?
I am working many hours today, but I am looking forward to putting on my favorite Charlie Daniels song and cuddling with my dog later.
Oh, that sounds nice. I love Charlie Daniels. I went to Japan last year and really enjoyed the food and culture.
That is so cool! I have never been to Japan, but it is on my bucket list.
You should definitely go! It is such a beautiful and vibrant country.
Thank you for the recommendation. I will definitely look into it.
You're welcome! I hope you have a wonderful day!
You too! Enjoy your wedding next week
